item.description:
Network with local business professionals, learn about why 90 for life is the simplest, easiest way to save money, get healthy and create wealth!

Meet World Renowned Naturopath Dr. Joel Wallach!

Dr. Joel Wallach - Health and Wellness Seminar!

The evening will begin with an overview of Youngevity which was founded by Legendary, world renowned Naturopath Dr. Joel Wallach. We will overview the company and give you an opportunity to sample some of the most popular products and we will feature our healthy coffee line - Javafit!

We will then hand the meeting over to Dr. Wallach, who will go through his health lecture Dead Doctors Don't Lie!

Dr. Joel Wallach - Health and Wellness Seminar!

The evening will begin with an overview of Youngevity which was founded by Legendary, world renowned Naturopath Dr. Joel Wallach. We will overview the company and give you an opportunity to sample some of the most popular products and we will feature our healthy coffee line - Javafit! We will then hand the meeting over to Dr. Wallach, who will go through his health lecture Dead Doctors Don't Lie!

Â 

See you there! Bernadette Trafton
item.how_to_find_us: Middle entrance - training center door, upstairs
